data.oai_dc:dc: Correlation coefficients and posterior probabilities from substitution rate analysis with Coevol 1.4b (partial coefficients summarized in Figure 2 colors). Raw posterior probabilities are reported as ranging from from 0.0 (100% support for a negative correlation) to 1.0 (100% support for a positive correlation). Negative correlations are reported as 1-raw in the main text.
extinction|life-history evolution|birds|molecular clocks|divergence time|metabolic rate|body size
